mainSection.value: Discover the magic of beer behind your flavors
mainSection.description: Enhance your visibility on social media by generating engaging captions and quotes based on your picture content.

description.text1:
Taggy will automatically generate keywords and hashtags based on the content of your picture.

You can choose the ones you want to generate captions and personalized quotes.

Generate texts in three different tones to share memories, reach more people or project a professional tone to promote your products.
With Taggy, you have the freedom to choose the style that best suits you.

Explore and create texts to suit you!

section3.title: Choose your personality and feelings ðŸ¤©

description.text1:
Want to make your post more fun, serious or professional?

Add personality and sentiment to your descriptions to fit your style and your target audience.

section4.title: Share the place and time ðŸ“…

description.text1:
Want to share where and when you took your photo?

Add additional context to your descriptions to make your posts more engaging and relevant.

Have you already created what you desired, but now struggling with the perfect description?

Upload your artwork and get inspiration for your captions in seconds.
Showcase the distinctive features in a compelling and captivating manner.

pricing.title: Post like a Pro
pricing.subtitle: Plans that fit your need
pricing.description: Hobby plan does not require a credit card.

hobbyFeatures.feature1: Generate captions and quotes in three different tones based on your picture content
hobbyFeatures.feature2: Get the most relevant keywords and hashtags.
hobbyFeatures.feature3: Edit the generated texts and keep the history of your generations.

creatorFeatures.feature2: Add additional context such as occasion and location.
creatorFeatures.feature3: Generate captions and quotes in 10 different languages.
creatorFeatures.feature4: Save your favorite generations to your profile.
creatorFeatures.feature5: Adjust your captions for Twitter now X.

ctaBottom.title: Start generating today
ctaBottom.subtitle: And choose the right words for your posts.
